dc:title: Untitled Review of Theology and Sanity
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Heartily recommends reading Theology and Sanity by Frank Sheed--to study about God, "this is happiness and joy." Notes that it is theology written by a layman, and the importance of their retreat work in learning to know and love and serve God.
